int getmonth(); int getday(); friend ostream& operator << (ostream& out, date& d); friend istream& operator >> (istream& in, date& d);};//Copyright©[2019]HalfGong.All rights Reserved date.#include "pch.h"#include"date.h"#include<iostream>#include<string>using namespace std;date::date(int y, int m, int d){ this->year = y; month = d.month; day = d.day;}date date::operator + (int num){ date t; t.year = this->year; t.month = this->month; t.day = this->day; date n; int flag = 0; while (num) { flag = 0; num--; day++; if (month == 2) { if (year % 4 == 0 && year % 100 != 0 || year % 400 == 0) { if (day > 29) { day = 1; year++; } } n.year = year; n.month = month; n.day = day; year = t.year; month = t.month; day = t.day; cout << n; return n;}date date::operator - (int num){ date t; t.year = this->year; t.month = this->month; t.day = this->day; date n; int flag = 0; while (num) { flag = 0; num--; day--; if (day == 0) { if (month == 3) { if (year % 4 == 0 && year % 100 != 0 || year % 400 == 0) { day = 29; flag = 1; } if (!(year % 4 == 0 && year % 100 != 0 || year % 400 == 0)) { day = 28; date m; m.year = this->year; m.month = this->month; m.day = this->day; date n1 = b, n2 = m; cout << "你输入的两个年份正确的顺序是："; if (n2.year > n1.year) { cout << b << "->" << m; while (n1.year != n2.year||n1.month != n2.month||n1.day != n2.day) { n1.day++; ans++; if (n1.year % 4 == 0 || n1.year % 100 != 0 && n1.year % 400 == 0) { if (n1.day > mon2[n1.month]) { n1.day = 1; n1.month++; } if (n1.month > 12) { n1.year++; n1.month = 1; } } else { if (n1.day > mon1[n1.month]) { n1.day = 1; n1.month++; } if (n1.month > 12) { n1.year++; n1.month = 1; } } } } else if (n2.year < n1.year) { cout << m << "->" << b; while (n1.year != n2.year||n1.month != n2.month||n1.day != n2.day) { n2.day++; n2.month++; } if (n2.month > 12) { n2.year++; n2.month = 1; } } } } else { if (n2.month > n1.month) { cout << b << "->" << m; while (n1.year != n2.year||n1.month != n2.month||n1.day != n2.day) { n1.day++; n2.month++; } if (n2.month > 12) { n2.year++; n2.month = 1; } } } } else { if (n2.day > n1.day) { cout << m << "->" << b; while (n1.year != n2.year||n1.month != n2.month||n1.day != n2.day) { n1.day++; posts.title: 时间类代码参考
posts.text:
时间类前言：为了应付邓涛的作业，找时间把时间类写了一下主要还是重载了运算与输出符 Time.h1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132#pragma once#include<iostream>using namespace std;class Time{private: int Hour; int Minute; int Second;public: Time(); ~Time(); Time(Time&); void SetHour(int hour); void SetMinute(int minute); void SetSecond(int second); int GetHour(); int GetMinute(); int GetSecond(); Time operator - (Time&); Time operator + (Time&); Time operator = (Time&); bool operator < (Time&); bool operator > (Time&); bool operator == (Time&); void sort(Time); friend ostream& operator << (ostream& out, Time& T); friend istream& operator >> (istream& in, Time& T);};//Copyright©[2019]HalfGong.All rights Reserved Time.#include "pch.h"#include "Time.h"Time::Time(){}Time::~Time(){}Time::Time(Time & T){ this->Hour = T.Hour; this->Minute = T.Minute; this->Second = T.Second;}void Time::SetHour(int hour){ this->Hour = hour;}void Time::SetMinute(int minute){ this->Minute = minute;}void Time::SetSecond(int second){ this->Second = second;}int Time::GetHour(){ return this->Hour;}int Time::GetMinute(){ return this->Minute;}int Time::GetSecond(){ return this->Second;}Time Time::operator-(Time &T){ this->Second = this->Second-T.Second; if (this->Second < 0) { this->Second += 60; this->Minute--; } this->Minute = this->Minute-T.Minute; if (this->Minute < 0) { this->Minute += 60; this->Hour--; } this->Hour = this->Hour - T.Hour; if (this->Hour < 0) { this->Hour += 24; } return *this;}Time Time::operator+(Time &T){ this->Second = this->Second + T.Second; if (this->Second > 59) { this->Second -= 60; this->Minute++; } this->Minute = this->Minute + T.Minute; if (this->Minute > 59) { this->Minute -= 60; this->Hour++; } this->Hour = this->Hour + T.Hour; if (this->Hour >= 24) { this->Hour -= 24; } return *this;}Time Time::operator=(Time &T){ this->Hour = T.Hour; this->Minute = T.Minute; this->Second = T.Second; return T;}bool Time::operator<(Time &T){ if (this->Hour > T.Hour) { return false; } else if (this->Hour < T.Hour) { return true; } else { if (this->Minute > T.Minute) { return false; } else if (this->Minute < T.Minute) { return true; } else { if (this->Second > T.Second) { return false; } else if (this->Second < T.Second) { return true; } else { return false; } } }}bool Time::operator>(Time &T){ if (this->Hour > T.Hour) { return true; } else if (this->Hour < T.Hour) { return false; } else { if (this->Minute > T.Minute) { return true; } else if (this->Minute < T.Minute) { return false; } else { if (this->Second > T.Second) { return true; } else if (this->Second < T.Second) { return false; } else { return false; } } }}bool Time::operator==(Time &T){ if (this->Hour == T.Hour&&this->Minute == T.Minute&&this->Second == T.Second) { return true; } else { return false; }}void Time::sort(Time T){ if (*this > T) { cout << T << "->" << *this; } else { cout << *this << "->" << T; }}ostream& operator << (ostream& out, Time& T){ cout << T.Hour << ":" << T.Minute << ":" << T.Second; return out;}istream& operator >> (istream& in, Time& T){ char n; cin >> T.Hour >> n >> T.Minute >> n >> T.Second; return in;}//Copyright©[2019]HalfGong.All rights Reserved main.cpp1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435#include"pch.h"#include<iostream>#include"Time.h"using namespace std;int main(){ Time time,time2,temp; char Operator; cout << "请输入时间
格式:“xx:xx:xx+xx:xx:xx或xx:xx:xx-xx:xx:xx”
"; cin >> time >> Operator; if (Operator == '+') { cin >> time2; cout << "
两个时间的先后顺序为：
"; time.sort(time2); time + time2; cout << "
结果为：
" << time << endl; } else if (Operator == '-') { cin >> time2; cout << "
两个时间的先后顺序为：
"; time.sort(time2); time - time2; cout << "
结果为：
" << time << endl; } else { cout << "非法符号"; }}//Copyright©[2019]HalfGong.All rights Reserved
